r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.3M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Markido. The average
  contract duration was 0.98 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $64.3K. The longest
  contract was 5.27 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $905.4K.
lookup_name: 'MARKIDO'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.3M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '78'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '10'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '13%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '1018%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.5'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '1.7M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.98'
s421_mean_contract_value: '64.3K'
s425_max_duration: '5.27'
s422_max_contract_value: '905.4K'
---
